website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a beach towel made of cotton without giving up the features of microfiber, this well-made towel is crafted in 100% cotton yet is lightweight and dries quickly.
pros: Differs from others on our shortlist for being made of quality, natural cotton that's highly absorbent
Dries surprisingly quickly for a cotton towel, and doesn't tend to shrink much when washed and dried
71 inch x 39 inch size is versatile and practical
cons: This towel is available in lots of color options, but some look duller in person than on your monitor

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, soft, doesn't shrink when washed, space saving - just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First things first - the packaging and the logo are A D O R A B L E. They will make for perfect holiday gifts. I bought the grey for myself for use at the beach and for poolside. Bye bye, heavy towels! This thing is great - very soft and absorbent, more so following a first wash and it didn't shrink. It is a very rich, cool grey color, and the minimalist pattern will go with anything. I plan to get another to use at the end of my bed like a throw to add to bedroom decor. The cotton material is just so nice to the touch!
customer_reviews.author: zuzuzu

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I liked this towel for its quick drying and very easy to pack since it is compact and light weight. Great for travel. Unisex me and my husband both got one for our Cancun vacation and they were lifesavers for the beach small to pack and don't take up a lot of room like other fluffy bath towels.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I love that this towel is so light and absorbs quite a bit of water. I'm still adjusting to the fact that it will not feel as plush as a traditional beach towel after a swim. As far as drying out fast, I'm undecided. It has already been sweltering and humid here in Tennessee, so I cannot give this towel a fair review on the quick dry category, because nothing dries fast in this kind of humidity. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alison R. Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Really really good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is super soft, I love it! I bought another peshtemal towel before and it shrunk after first wash which was really annoying. This one came washed so the size after the washing (and ironing) is pretty much the same. Also, I think while normal towels give my hair a frizz, peshtemal towels do a good job. This towel was super soft, absorbent and my hair loved it! The color is really really nice (see the video). Since the photo is indoor, video will give a better idea of the color. I think it is a good beach towel as well since it is light weight and absorbent. A definite go!
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Ayaydin

customer_reviews.title: Best item we took on our trip to Hawaii.
customer_reviews.text: Best item we took on our trip to Hawaii. We knew the resort provides towels but these were wonderful to use as a cover up. My husband often used his to cover his legs when he needed a break from the sun. Also came in clutch for days that the wind made it cooler out.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Weyandt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TURKISH TOWEL!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lost Turkish towels and had this on her wish list for Christmas. It's very absorbent, many colors to choose from. I bought the turquoise and the colors are vibrant and it washes up really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and absorbent and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Turkish-type towels I have purchased on Amazon. The others have been rough and almost felt like they were a blend and not true cotton. I got the purple color and it is lovely. It ties around my body like a sarong and I am considered smaller plus size. I also used it to rig a sling to help me carry my toddler from the beach when she was too tired to walk. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price compared to the ones I bought for half the price (in USD) directly in Australia. This one is not as thick and “sturdy” as the ones I already have and only time will tell how they hold up. We use them in the cars for seat covers and on the porch as wraps as well as to absorb the rain. Unfortunately the ones I got in Aus don’t have the tag anymore so it is trial and error to find one just as good. I will keep the Wetcat one because I love the color. But continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Katsikas

customer_reviews.title: Trust me—buy elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality—will discolor!! I got to use this only once. Went to a pool, laid on a black chair, had on a white bathing suit, and after laying it out in the sun to dry, it discolored with brownish/red spots all over it!! So disappointed—will be calling to complain and ask for a refund. Do not waist your money. Tried washing it but did not help. Provided pictures for reference. Hope you do not make the same mistake I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hecker

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed by this towel.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was a skeptic. This towel looks and feels like a table cloth. I bought it to replace some of my old and worn out traditional beach towels. So to test it out, I used it after showering. It not only completely dried my skin, I worked on my long hair. I hung it up to dry and it air-dried very quickly. Washed and dried beautifully in the washer/dryer. I initially purchased two of these towels based on the reviews on Amazon. I will certainly buy more and replace my other beach towels. I'm sold. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: A unique kind of beach towel
customer_reviews.text: This is not a typical terry cloth beach towel. It is a lightweight woven cotton material that doesn't take much room in your bag. It's fine if you want to lay on it in the sand at the beach or dry off after getting out of the water. Since it's so lightweight, it's even better than a terry cloth towel as a cover for some protection from the sun. If you like to roll up your towel and use it as a pillow on your beach chair, this probably won't do since it's only about 3" thick when rolled up. It dries quickly. The color (mine is navy) is exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Edison buyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT-LOOKING LIGHTWEIGHT AND THIN (BUT NOT TOO, TOO THIN) BEACH TOWEL
customer_reviews.text: I kept reading reviews praising Turkish cotton Peshtemal towels and wondered what they felt like, so I tried this one. first, the green color is really a nice shade and intense enough that I don't expect it to fade out. The random white striped lines add some pizazz but at the same time, look conservative enough to hang in my bathroom. They are not stiff at all (as I had feared). I see photos of people wearing them like beach coverups, shawls, and sarongs. Sitting on it as a beach towel, I found the only drawback afterwards: it wrinkled a lot after it dried.
customer_reviews.author: TallPat

customer_reviews.title: Bought three more
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. I was hesitant to buy at first because it seemed too good to be true. But it is an amazing towel. We live in a van full time and we don’t have space for a regular towel and we don’t have time to let it dry. This thing is so thin and dries so quickly but it’s super absorbent. Bought three more after this one, to replace other towels.
customer_reviews.author: Shivakamini

customer_reviews.title: Thinly made
customer_reviews.text: So thin it’s cheap and absorbs no water out of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Fiddy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of benefits
customer_reviews.text: I love these lightweight, quick drying towels. I’ve taken one star away because the fringe on one of the towels has come unraveled. Since I use them in my bathroom, I’m disappointed that the appearance is no longer desirable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Millet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a beachy boardwalk themed bathroom and this was perfect. Made it feel even more beachy. I do use the towel too. I live in Florida so a nice light towel to wrap around until I get dressed is so much better than my big heavy ones and heavy robe. The color is bright, easy to wash, dries very fast on the towel rack, and it's absorbent. I'm going to buy more in a few other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: WetCat ROCKS ....
customer_reviews.text: Every Year I Search For A Favorite Thing.....Something That I Like And Meets Up To My Standards And This Year I Have Found It With Your "WetCat" Towel. I Plan On Purchasing Probably About 10 Of Them For Christmas Gifts. Even The Guys Are Getting Them .... I Will Buy Them "BOY" Colors !!!!! I Have Used My Pink WetCat As A Towel And As A Shawl ..... Maybe I Need To Get Another One ...... And It Will Be A Multi Purpose Item As I Plan On Taking It With Me On The Plane To Use As Security Blanket !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ricci

customer_reviews.title: It was not soft and plush like I had hoped  it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be a very plush, soft towel and it was not. It was light weight! I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Segal

customer_reviews.title: Not a dry off sort of towel
customer_reviews.text: This is not a dry off towel as I expected, this is a cover or sitting towel only.
customer_reviews.author: littlemomma

customer_reviews.title: Very light towel, can be good or bad depending on your needs
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers noted, this is a very light towel which is easy to stuff in a bag and carry around or put over as a lightweight blanket, but can be less than optimal if you're having a picnic on rough ground. You'll definitely feel everything you're sitting on and it won't be the most comfortable experience. Towel is easy to clean (just threw it in the washing machine with no special cycles) and kept its color, form, and texture well. I have not used this in the beach yet, but I imagine that sand would be a more comfortable place to lay down the towel, versus hard grass parks.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: love these but my kids do not LOL
customer_reviews.text: Not soft, but VERY durable, absorbent, and beautifully made!! My husband and I love them but my kids hate them, saying they are "too itchy and too rough" XD If you love a traditional bath towel due to it's softness, these turkish towels probably won't be for you, lol! I use them in the bathroom as regular bath towels and for our backyard Pool time. These towels are a great size, great colors, and they save SO MUCH Space in my linen closet!!! I also use them as blankets for the beach and/or the park. I've eve seen people use them as throw blankets. I highly recommend these towels :)
customer_reviews.author: a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel for my wife! Great for laying on, can use as a wrap skirt, and takes up very little space. I wouldn’t use this as a main towel to dry off with but more for after you dry off and just need a little something to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Perfect beach towel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two before a beach trip and love them! We got compliments from our family and they ended up ordering some as well. It’s lightweight (but strong), absorbs well and was comfortable when laying on the beach. We had a wave come up and soak a few towels, this one and a few regular ones and this one. The regular ones were still wet the next day, this one was dry before we left the beach in an hour. Best beach towel there is! ps. This review was unsolicited, I just really value reviews and loved this towel enough to leave a raving one for others to read ( :
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: First, i have not washed it yet. But it has the thickness of a tablecloth,i.e. very thin. Not what i was expecting in a beach towel. Maybe it still works out. Says something about getting fluffier, thicker after washing. Just mentioning
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these towels!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten 3 of these towels now and would get more if I could find an excuse! they are amazing! big huge and comfortable, perfect for wrapping up in, wearing as a cover up, and lounging on at the pool. They are way more absorbent then they look, dry out fast, are colorfast and pack down small for easy transportation. I'd give them 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Summer must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. I have bought them as gifts for many friends because I want everyone I know to have one! They are so versatile. I like to keep one in my car to use as a park/picnic blanket. Excellent for the pool or beach. Easy to pack when travelling because they take up so little space. Also great to use as a bathing suit cover up by tying it around your waste. Don't just buy one, you will want more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of these until I saw a YouTube video about 10 must have items. I’m a photographer and this really intrigued me. It works as a towel to dry, a towel to sit on, a wrap to stay warm, something to wrap around your waist and so many other things. It’s functional and fashionable. In my book, that’s just what I’m looking for. I’ll be buying more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lightweight, package, multi-purpose, quick-drying
customer_reviews.text: How do I give this 10 stars? This is my favorite purchase in a long time! I was planning to use these for the pool, but I may just replace all my towels with them - they are so lightweight and pack able, and soft. Zero chemical smell out of the package, appears to be excellent quality - I’m wearing one right now around my shoulders like a pashmina or shawl. They are BEAUTIFUL. I’m I completely enamored.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Phillips

customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel because I wanted a lightweight and cute beach towel. It is definitely both of those things, and can fit in a small bag which is cool. I didn’t think it was great at absorbing water, but it was okay. The main reason I knocked off two stars rather than one is because it was advertised as being sand-proof and that sand didn’t stick much, but sand definitely sticks and is just as hard to get off as a normal beach towel. It is very cute and soft though. I’m Going to take it to the pool and see if that makes me like it more.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Casselli

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about ordering this as a beach towel because it seemed too thin to be absorbent. Trusted the amazon reviews and ordered the Teal and I'm SO in love. It's very absorbent, super soft, and the best part is that it rolls/folds up so small so I can easily fit it in my beach bag with no issues. Husband loved it so much that he even ordered himself one in black!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ledet

customer_reviews.title: Beach/Pool Towel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for home bathroom use, but it just felt more like I was drying off with a tablecloth. However, I do love this towel! It's great for the beach, pool, or a picnic. It's light and takes up waaaay less space than a traditional towel. I highly recommend it for those purposes.
customer_reviews.author: jaTN

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on these towels now - they are HUGE, soft, and dry quickly. It does take some time getting used to the different texture, but now it's hard for me to go back to the thick fluffy towels. They are great for travel or to use as beach towels because they fold down really well - UNLIKE a bulky beach towel that takes up the whole bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Great all around towel
customer_reviews.text: I have been seeing all kinds of ads for turkish 'sand resistant' towels. I decided to try one out. Wetcat came very highly reviewed and I liked the colors and price point. I am so happy I bought one, in fact I just ordered my second. It is a great size for a single person, I have used it at the beach, at my house as a blanket, and as my towel after my shower. I would probably stick to a big fluffy towel in the winter months, but this was perfect for summer. I plan to use one as my shower towel and my second will be my beach towel, cover-up, blanket
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and vibrantly colored; super versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cute product associated with a cat named Lucy. There are lots of Turkish towel options out there, but I found that Wetcat had the color selection in the price range I wanted. Perfect option. If you haven't switched over to Turkish towels, you must. They are lightweight and absorbent, and can be used under you, over you, or even on you, like a sarong.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Towel!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised that the towel was as absorbent as it is for such a thin towel. Right out of the bag it was soft and smelled clean no harsh chemical smells. My husband got the dark blue and I got the orange both are true to online color. We've used them a couple times now at the beach and so far they are good at drying us off but not very sand resistant and takes a litter longer than expected to air dry. Will definitely be buying more as we are both very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Breiana

customer_reviews.title: Cute, thin towel
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cute towel. This fabric seems a bit thinner than other Turkish towels I have met. It’s the size of a sarong, so you can wrap it around yourself at the beach or pool. Absorbent like a dish towel, so it gets sopping wet as you dry yourself, but it air dries quickly. Easier to carry, more space saving and lighter than beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel!!! Makes packing up from the beach so easy. I was also able to wrap and tie it around my five year old for our walk back to the car. Very convenient. I’ve dried it twice on high heat, accidentally 😅, and it’s been fine! I won’t continue to but glad it held up ok. I just wish they were cheaper so I could get one for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Clemon

customer_reviews.title: Best beach/pool towel I’ve ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a beach/pool towel. I’m tired of struggling wit the big and heavy terry cloth ones. They are difficult to travel with and take a long time to dry. I love this towel! It’s lightweight, soft, super absorbent and pre-shrunk! It folds up so small so it takes up no room at all in luggage and it’s big enough to wrap around you and stay tided! I liked it so much, I’ve just ordered two more as gifts. You will not be sorry if you are looking for a towel for all the same reasons I was. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sanmore

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and gorgeous turquoise color!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in turquoise to be used at the lake, for outdoor yoga, an outdoor tablecloth, and to use as a towel. I love the color, the lightweight and versatility! Since I didn't get to go on vacation this summer (the ocean) the versatility and color makes me feel like I'm on vacation all summer long! I have purchased similar Turkish towels in different colors, but they're not as long as Wetcat's Turkish towels. They are a little rough at first, but it doesn't bother me. Overall, I highly recommend these versatile Turkish towels. You can feel like you're on vacation year round!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Turkish towel, so I can not compare to a “real” one. That being said, I am impressed. The towel is light weight, beautiful color, and a great size. We have used it to cover the top of a piece of furniture, as a towel, and as a lightweight cover. No funny odors. It’s not scratchy at all. The color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after first wash
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this towel but it’s already falling apart on me and I haven’t even used it yet. I just did a quick wash and hang dry and noticed all the ends coming unraveled. Sad because it’s a great product otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so glad I ordered this. Took it for a weekend in Havasu and it was great and not too "heavy" Tied up the ends and wore it around my waist a couple times. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony King

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wore it to girls weekend at cabin, lots of compliments and wanted to order for themselves. It is very big too. Wore as wrap and i am not a small woman. 😄
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for by the pool
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these towels! I bought them in two colors and they came exactly as advertised. Ive had them through 5-6 washes and they’ve held up, no rips or anything. I love lightweight towels for by the pool, they do get wet really easily but they dry off fast too so I guess it depends what you’re looking for. It’s perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & smart.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this light & absorbent towel. I soaked it in cold water 24 hours before washing it as directed & it didn’t shrink, it just isn’t as soft as I thought, or would like it to be. It is super absorbent, which I love. Love the color. Like how versatile it is...thin & easy to wrap around my waist as a sarong when swimming or at the beach/lake & then used as the towel. Would purchase another towel like this.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Really Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: I don't anything about Turkish towels I guess. This was nothing like a towel. Just thin fabric. A T-shirt will absorb water, but I would not call it a towel. I'm going to keep them because the color was perfect and they will be useful for my photography. My swimming guests will get actual towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft and super absorbent..
customer_reviews.text: I always take it with me to the beach. But as I am used to terrycloth, it took me time to start using it after shower. Now I just can't give it up. It is super soft, very absorbent, dries quickly and doesn't take much space in my closet. I ironed it after washing as suggested and the size is pretty much the same as it was before washing. Definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Levonardovinci

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and lightweight. I ordered grey and loved the color. They work well for drying off but since they are so thin they don’t really work great for laying down on. The sand was a little wet and so the water seeped right through in seconds and it looked like I had sat down on it with a wet bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: These beach "towels" are more like beach sheets. I did not know beach towels could be made so thin. Very unsatisfied in this purchase. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I loved those towels in terms of light weight for travelling and ability to carry in your backpack. The absorbency is definitely a bit less that normal towel but it did the job. I love the way it looks, you can use it as towel, small blanket, and picnic as well. good for gifts as well. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to wash prior to use. It’s way more absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Wet Cat to be a multi purpose item. I’ve used it for a beach towel, shower and hair towel as we as a travel blanket. It did not disappoint. Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Got this towel for a recent beach trip mostly because I was looking for something that didn't draw sand like a magnet. This worked perfectly. Easy to shake off, dries quickly, and was ready for reuse without much effort. Exactly what I wanted and am happy with my purchase. If I went to the beach more often, I would probably buy multiple.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, very thin, very absorbent but naturally the quantity of water absorbed is low due to thinness. Not my favorite beach towel as it didn’t stay spread out on the sand and no padding. It was too thin for that. Would be good for travel or exercise or as a seat cover maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Functional thin towel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a compact towel to keep in a beach/pool go-bag in my car or for travel, and this fills the bill. Not super soft, but soft enough to use on my preschooler after swim class. It doesn't insulate at all, so it's useful just for doing off, not for keeping warm.
customer_reviews.author: polecat

customer_reviews.title: Great beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect on a recent Jersey shore trip. I wanted to take just one small suitcase and this helped make that possible. I even used it on a cooler day as a scarf on the walk back to where we were staying. Would buy again and thinking of using it year round as a bath sheet.
customer_reviews.author: polysigh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the idea behind these towels are totally over rated. Don’t do it. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: Jenilea1

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase choice!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! So lightweight and excellent absorption. We have them on vacation and it makes it so much easier to go to the beach! No heavy beach bags. Going to get some for every day!
customer_reviews.author: BSaint

customer_reviews.title: Not what I Was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a plush absorbent beach towel for my so and husband This large colorful fabric would make a nice sarong. But that was not what I wanted. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying - great colors - lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors - we purchased the light blue and orange. They are very soft and super lightweight. Prefer these over traditional thick beach towels. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer & Sean

customer_reviews.title: Stop scrolling! You found what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I washed it twice the day I received it as we were leaving for vacation the next morning. I had the pleasure of using it as a light weight blanket on the plane, a towel, a scarf and a swimsuit cover up! How did I not discover these before now?! I will never buy another plain Jane beach towel. It was more absorbent than my spouse’s beach towel, wayyyyy softer & was dry before my head hit the pillow at night.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I love these. We have a pool and go through towels quickly. These dry fast, take up very little space and launder superbly.
customer_reviews.author: K Garay

customer_reviews.title: Dries quick, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect lightweight towel for a pool day. Great for a wrap around my big booty, like a sarong. One day I accidentally sat in a big puddle and soaked the thing through. Within a half hour of laying it flat in the grass it was completely dry! Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. These are not real Turkish towels. They are not absorbing at all. Even with many washes they are still terrible and scratchy. I ordered another brand for my toddler and we will be switching to that brand as well. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kate washburn

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with my towel! It weighed nothing in my bag, folded up so small that it didn't take up much room, and dried up quickly each time I got it wet at the beach. I loved how large it was, and it felt decent on my skin when drying my face. I'm not sure if it would have dried as fast if it weren't laying in the sun, but I'm happy I only needed to use one towel while I was there. Usually I need 2 because my first towel will get soaked and take too long to dry!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely perfect. I bought it for my mother to use as a little blanket on the plane. It's just enough weight and yet small enough to easily rollup into her "personal item" tote bag for the plane ride across country. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Haley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I love this towel, it is absorbent, soft, so light, packed in my suitcase to practically nothing, and dried almost as fast as it took me to get dressed and do my very minimal make-up routine. I hate hotel towels and since I travel for work a lot I got this in hopes it could replace the regular towel I usually bring and get more space for shoes in my suitcase; it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Sand Cloud Dupe!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is awesome! I got it two days after I ordered it and came packed nicely! When rolled up it is no bigger than the height and width of a chapstick! It’s perfect for my upcoming trip as I’m only bringing a carry-on. The color is exactly what I ordered and looks just like the picture. High quality craftsmanship and the tassels on the ends look like they will hold up but I’m going to knot them again just in case! These towels are as big as a standard towel and if you’re looking at Sand Cloud towels these are identical for over half the price! Very please with my purchase and will be buying more for my family!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels
customer_reviews.text: I love the way Turkish towels feel and absorb water. These towels are especially soft. The are really large so you can wrap all up in them when drying. I've been using this towel for many months now and it's holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for travel. Recently returned from a 10 day vacation to Cabo San Lucas. This towel took up very little space in my carry on. I loved how fast it dried, especially with the humidity. We plan on purchasing one for my husband. The price was terrific, too! So many other companies selling these type of towels for crazy high prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low cost but can tell it’s not high quality
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely tell a difference in quality with this towel compared to more expensive brands. This one isn’t as soft or nice feeling as some better ones I’ve since purchased. But, if you are looking for something really low-cost, this one is a good value. It’s still lightweight and doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Absorbent, and Dries quick!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are amazing! Absorbent and quick to dry. Plus they are nice and thin to pack for the beach especially for vacations (don't wanna waste space in the suitcase with a big towel). Plan on buying a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected new favorite towels
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to believe that these towels absorb so much water but they do! High quality, lightweight & great if you need to fit more than one in your bag, and cute if you want to wrap it around your waist as a sarong on your way to/from the beach (which you can’t do with a regular towel). Wasn’t expecting to love these as much as I do but they’re great. Never buying “regular” beach towels again!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Just too light.
customer_reviews.text: Just too light weight to be an effective Beach towel.
customer_reviews.author: mark lienau

customer_reviews.title: Good vacation towels.
customer_reviews.text: Took these on a tropical vacation and they were exactly what I was looking for and needed. Dried quickly despite the very wet environment.
customer_reviews.author: CCCSPI

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this towel does not have water dripping off of it. Dries super quick, but stays damp enough that it cools you off in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that they would be too thin to be as absorbent as my other towels. I was wrong. They are very absorbent and they dry quickly. They don't feel like my thick towels, so it took a couple of minutes to get use to how they feel on my skin. I'm looking forward to taking them when we travel. I like it when an item has many uses!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels! I got two for my husband and I. They dry quick and are long. I like the variety of colors. I recommend tossing your current beach towels and replacing with these. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: different but great!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this when I got it but I was so intrigued by the appeal of not having to carry a super heavy bulky beach towel down to the pool. This towel is soft, lightweight, and perfect for wrapping around myself.
customer_reviews.author: thankshermione

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Own 2 Gifted 1
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Second one purchased of three from Wet Cat. Far superior than the others I ordered in a six pack, although I think those will be decent in a few washes. Wet Cat is perfectly soft right out of the package!
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Great travel towel
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight this towel is. It feels like a cozy shawl! The absorbency is just OK, but I love that it doesn’t get super heavy when wet, dries quickly, and that the pokey grass burrs in Texas don’t tend to stick to it like with thicker towels.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these towels and we LOVED them! They were perfect for the beach and the pool. Dried very quickly, weren’t bulky and so soft! My kiddos loved them too! I’d definitely recommend and have already recommended to several friends!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Soft material  and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red towel and it looks just as advertised. It is super soft and lightweight and perfect for my needs. I cannot judge absorbency as I don’t use it for that purpose. I like this as a towel to cover up my legs when the beach gets chilly and didn’t want a bulky towel to carry back and forth. I like that it is very soft and not scratchy. Worth it but would look at reviews regarding absorbency if that is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja C

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and packable beach towel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a beach towel that was packable and not bulky and this towel worked out perfectly! It absorbs water well and is soft. Looking forward to years of use with this beach towel!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Pills Easily
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my new towel, but after washing per the instructions...my brand new towel has pills. I hope it's just a disappointing aesthetic and will not create a scratchy drying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing towels! I was shocked about how absorbent they are. Also could be used for sarong, scarf, beachwear. I bought for my travel trailer as they are quite compact when folded. Very well made. I have already ordered more for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Medical provider

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not functional
customer_reviews.text: This isn't much more than a shawl. Definitely not a towel. It will tear very easily. It's very delicate. The color is nice but it's not absorbent at all, and just not functional in my opinion. It's a little TOO lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

customer_reviews.title: i'll definitely order other products from this seller brand
customer_reviews.text: i'll definitely order other products from this seller brand. a beautiful lightweight with fringe pestamel turkish towel, wrap, beach wherever you need a large cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ataturk

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel its the best. I washed it before use and it was just as soft and vibrant in color as when I got it. Folds up nicely and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this in the mail and my daughter is excited! The color is great and it's so soft and lightweight. It dried quickly. I'm hoping sand doesn't stick to it because I have high hopes for this beach towel!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Maier

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on you!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors... beautiful muted pastels for me. Very absorbent. Absorbs the water, doesn't just push it around. Wonderful drape and a size generous enough to wrap around you with room to be creative with that. Thin, but a feature that adds to the draping and lightness that you can luxuriate in the wrap - air drying these are quick. Using for after shower/bath, will use for beach/lake/pool side. Looking forward to not washing/drying heavy terry cloth towels.
customer_reviews.author: laurie fong

customer_reviews.title: The color pops
customer_reviews.text: Love the green color of these towels. They are very lightweight & easy to carry so it makes them the perfect towel to tug a long on your outing. Just remember they are SUPER thin. We have also snuggled up with them as light weight blankets on a windy day outside. We love that they are multi use! No regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, color and weight!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this color ! It’s a beautiful deep berry pink...I needed a towel for my outdoor shower , we swim in the pool daily and rinse off outside in the shower. We live in Florida and it’s very hot here, this light weight towel is perfect! And bonus the color is amazing and fun. The size is great, covers the body fully without my neighbors getting a peak! 😉
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight option
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of this towel and it is so much lighter and easier to pack than my traditional beach towels. It dried amazingly fast and doesn’t get laden with sand like a normal towel does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought three and they were amazing
customer_reviews.text: Snug like a bug in a rug. This towel is soooo amazing and soft and light and absorbant. Took it to the ocean and it was our towel and when the baby fell asleep she was so comfortable sleeping with it. The towel gave good protection against the sun too!!!! So happy we made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying and great for beach!
customer_reviews.text: This towel was a bit thinner than I had expected, but its perfect for the beach! Dries pretty quickly in the sun and is great for laying out. If you're looking for something you can use to dry off with that won't leave your car wet, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try it out
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and style of this towel they said that it was a beach towel certainly big enough to be one it doesn't seem like it would absorb much it's pretty thin but I'll still use it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Martin

customer_reviews.title: Soft and absorbent 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is a great turkish towel! Absorbent and soft right out of the box. Very pleased with it! I’ve thrown out all the old icky terrycloth towels, and use these exclusively in the bathroom. Some Turkish towels are not as absorbent, but this brand is really great!
customer_reviews.author: V Mad

customer_reviews.title: Tassels not secured properly
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these towels to take on holiday with me however I only washed it once straight as it came following the instructions but the tassels unravelled and tbh it’s annoying to have those stringy part like that so I had to sit and try to re braid but I don’t really want to be doing that everytime I wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly L

customer_reviews.title: absorbant, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: great towel - haven't used for long so can't tell how it will last . Washed once and seems to do well - did not dry in dryer and looks/feels well
customer_reviews.author: DallasW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight beach addition
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and easy to pack for the beach or camping. Absorbs well, but does take a bit longer to dry than I anticipated. Love the color though and overall really pleased with the purchase. I would but again.
customer_reviews.author: MWilson

product_meta.title: WETCAT Original Turkish Beach Towels (39 x 71) - Prewashed Bath Towel, 100% Cotton - Highly Absorbent, Quick Dry and Ultra-Soft - Washer-Safe, No Shrinkage - Stylish, Eco-Friendly - [Black]
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Discover the Difference of Prewashed Softness!

When it comes to towels, you probably use traditional terrycloth. And while it’s a highly absorbent 
material, it’s thick design makes it very impractical. Not only is it slow-drying, it’s also heavy and 
bulky, making it inconvenient for travel.

With Wetcat’s Original Turkish Beach Towel, you’ll wrap yourself in a bit of luxury! Made with 
100% cotton, it’s highly absorbent and ideal for use at the spa, by the pool or just at home. Thinner 
than terrycloth, our Turkish towel incredibly quick-drying, making it less prone to mildew growth and odor. And 
because it’s super-soft, it’s gentle enough for babies and those with sensitive skin.

But what sets Wetcat apart from the competition? We prewash all our towels! While other brands’ 
towels are rough, ours offer cloud-like comfort as soon as they arrive. At 38 x 71,” you can use it 
as a picnic blanket, while camping or during yoga class. The lightweight, foldable design makes it 
great for travel and storage, and you can even throw it in the washer with no risk of shrinkage!

Love our vibrant colors and fun fringe? It’s all thanks to our design expert, Lucy the Cat! Made in 
Turkey, she demanded our towels be made with OEKO-TEX certified natural dyed yarn, making 
them safe for you and the environment.

Why Choose Our Turkish Bath Towels?

- Highly absorbent and quick-drying
- Prewashed for softness and no shrinkage
- Multipurpose and great for travel
- Safe in the washer and dryer
- Durable, eco-friendly design


Try Today Risk-Free with Our Money Back Guarantee!

*Stock is limited. Order today to ensure availability.

Order Your Turkish Beach Blanket Now for Prewashed Comfort!
feature_bullets: HIGHLY ABSORBENT AND QUICK-DRYING: Thinner than terrycloth but just as absorbent, our peshtemal towel is a must-have after your bath or shower! Made with 100% cotton, it’s incredibly fast-drying and luxuriously soft, so it’s gentle on even the most delicate skin.

GREAT ON-THE-GO: At 38 x 71,” our Turkish towel is lightweight, compact and perfect for travel! Super-convenient to pack and carry, you can use it by the pool, at your gym, on a hike or at a spa. And since it won’t hold sand, it’s an ideal beach blanket or towel.

HASSLE-FREE CLEANING: For a cleanup that’s truly effortless, our Turkish bath towels are washer and dryer-safe! Every one is prewashed, so it’s ultra-soft and won’t shrink when you follow the care instructions. Just be sure to iron after washing to return it to its full size.

MADE WITH LOVE: For a fouta that’s absolutely pur-fect, we called our kitty co-founder, Lucy the Cat! The unique 5-stripe design was inspired by her 5 claws, together with classic striped Turkish towels. Made in Turkey with OEKO-TEX certified natural dyed yarn, it’s safe for you and for the environment.

SHOP RISK-FREE: A great gift for anyone who loves style and quality, our pestemal towel can be used as a throw, scarf, sarong, wrap or cover up! Each Turkish bath towel comes with a 30-day money back guarantee, so just let us know if you run into any problems.
